publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2690 Dr Elaine Murray:Gretna are also the Champions!—That the Parliament congratulates Gretna Football Club on winning the Third Division of the Scottish Football League and looks forward to the Raydale Park team’s contribution to the Second Division next season.
S2M-2690 Gretna are also the Champions! (lodged on 12 April 2005) Dennis Canavan*
S2M-2690 Gretna are also the Champions! (lodged on 12 April 2005) Murray Tosh*

S2M-2690 Dr Elaine Murray: Gretna are also the Champions!—That the Parliament congratulates Gretna Football Club on winning the Third Division of the Scottish Football League and looks forward to the Raydale Park team’s contribution to the Second Division next season. Supported by: Dennis Canavan, Murray Tosh
S2M-2690 Gretna are also the Champions! (lodged on 12 April 2005) Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-2690 Gretna are also the Champions! (lodged on 12 April 2005) Alex Fergusson*
